mapper.insert: insert into jjstudy.user(email, name, password, nickName, birth, gender, phoneNum) values(#{email}, #{name}, #{password}, #{nickName}, #{birth}, #{gender}, #{phoneNum});
mapper.select: select * from jjstudy.user where email = #{email} and password = #{password}
mapper.update: update jjstudy.user set name=#{name}, nickname=#{nickName}, gender=#{gender}, phoneNum=#{phoneNum}, birth=#{birth}, photo=#{photo} where email=#{email};

update jjstudy.user set password=#{password} where email=#{email};
